titleStmt.title: A discourse of the excellency of the heavenly substance which is useful for the present, and so may be for future times.
titleStmt.author: Hickes, John, 1633-1685.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Hickes by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: cropped and faded, with print show-through and some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
